description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Deportivo Alavés vs Rayo Vallecano in the Spanish La Liga
title: Deportivo Alavés vs Rayo Vallecano: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head
title_page: Deportivo Alavés vs Rayo Vallecano: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Attempt missed. Toni Martínez (Alaves) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Tomás Conechny with a cross.
Post
Attempt blocked. Pedro Díaz (Rayo Vallecano) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Pathé Ciss.
Post
Fourth official has announced 5 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt missed. Pedro Díaz (Rayo Vallecano) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left.
Post
Attempt blocked. Kike García (Alaves) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Carlos Vicente.
Post
Attempt missed. Aridane Hernández (Rayo Vallecano) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Unai López with a cross following a corner.
